price: Wͻkaa sε: “Yɛntumi nnyi wo (Farao) na yɛnnyae nsεnkyerεnee pefee a aba yεn hͻ, ne (Nyankopͻn) no a Ɔbͻͻ yεn no, enti atemmuo (biara) a wowͻ bu (tia yεn no) bu (tia yεn). Wiase asetena yi mu atemmuo na wobɛtumi abuo”.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنَاۖ فَٱقۡضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍۖ إِنَّمَا تَقۡضِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū lan nu'thiraka ʿalā mā jāanā mina al-bayināti wa-alladhī faṭaranā fa-iq'ḍi mā anta qāḍin innamā taqḍī hādhihi al-ḥayata al-dun'yā
